name: Spooky Stairs
description:
Made for CMPM170 Jam2 ! It's a horror puzzle game!

Prompt: A Room Without Walls

  • Felix Li - Game Mechanics programmer
  • Christopher Mathie - 3D Modeler: Environment and Objects, Style: industrial horror
  • Darong Li - Puzzle Designer
  • Johnny Wong - 2D Artist / generalist
  • Justin Beedle - junior programmer / producer / generalist (tar that fills the holes in the sinking ship)
  • Stephanie Styffe - Foley, music, learn nothing stay stupid
  • Nathan Prieto -  Puzzle Design
